hints.content:
We can think of division as the following:

$\greenD{\text{ Total}}\div\blueD{\text{ Number of Groups}}$

or 

$\greenD{\text{ Total}}\div\maroonD{\text{ Size of the Groups}}$

We have a $\greenD{\text{total}}$ of $\greenD{27}$ apples.

The $\blueD{\text{number of groups}}$ of apples is $\blueD3$.  

Which image shows $\greenD{27}$ apples divided  evenly in $\blueD{3}$ groups?

This image represents the situation:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: Three groups of 9 apples. Each group of apples has a circle around it. !

question.content:

**Which image could represent this situation?**
